subsec.title: purpose
subsec.p: My aim in this site is to give the reader a vivid sense of the dynamics of my current philosophical projects.
I have two book-writing projects taking off right now, and every step along these roads of discovery will be presented here on RBJones.com long before the books ever appear in print.
The site also contains a variety of previous cogitations.

subsec.title: the books
subsec.p: The first of these projects is to be entitled "Metaphysical Positivism" and will be a new formulation of positivist philosophy. The book is intended to be a prose volume of similar scale and character to A.J.Ayer's "Language Truth and Logic".

The second, which provides both background research for the former and an extended exemplar of a method of formal analysis advocated in that book, will be an analytic history of aspects of philosophical logic, semantics and metaphysics.
